title: 100% Natural Ingredients
desc: No additives, no artificial matter, no genetically modified stuff—only pure, naturally existing ingredients.

title: Sustainably Sourced
desc: Ain't no shit gonna hurt from us juicing dem fruits—our ingredients are handpicked meticulously from local farms without any ill-intentions.

title: Supporting Environment Cause
desc: We pay more so nature suffers less—for every portion of juice sold, we donate IDR 2,000 to partnering environmental NGOs.

title: Fulfill Your Goals
desc: Hit bullseye everytime with our accurate nutrition tracking—down to the last minute details—to keep track of your goals, whatever the form they take of.

title: Gamification Activated
desc: You will never walk alone in this quest of awesomeness! Your journey will be filled with small wins and shiny items and achievements. So, are you ready, player one?

title: Backed by Science
desc: Those nutritional values do not fall from the sky—our scientists have done extensive research to make sure that the contents stay true to the nature.
